subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Mikhail D. Prokhorov, in his first extensive news conference as owner of the Nets, was glib, funny, exceedingly confident and — on the major issues — mostly guarded.
snippet: Mikhail D. Prokhorov, in his first extensive news conference as owner of the Nets, was glib, funny, exceedingly confident and — on the major issues — mostly guarded.
